comment.author: 35603348@N03
comment._content: I classic NSWGR signal box that was superceded circa 1979 when Sydney Yard was resignalled. Thanks for adding this and the other excellent images to the group.

comment.author: 57407120@N07
comment._content:
I spent a bit of time up in that box during my telecommunications apprenticeship Days mid 1970s.
Sydney yard brings back memories.
